channel.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][b]Paladious has been officialy released to public![/b][/size][/center] [center][img]http://paladious.org/images/Paladious-banner-1.png[/img]
www.paladious.org
Welcome to Paladious adertisement thread. Paladious is RuneScape priate server since 2009. Closed in 2013 spring and re-opened in December 2013. Paladious is skilling and PVM focused server that has tons of bosses to destroy and all 24 skills functioning. Skills has been flawed to almost perfection. No spam clicking or consnstant screen gazing. Almost every skill has been cycled. Make 1,5,10,all. Bosses are detailed and some of them almost impossible to solo. Updates two times per week, makes Paladious one of most active programmed server out there. Paladious has carefully selected staff to assist players and help Paladious grow bigger then ever. Stability of server is insane. Paladious test run was 2 months without server restart on 512mb ram linux vps. Paladious has it all... Just come and see yourself. Hope to see you ingame soon!
[url=http://www.paladious.org][img]http://paladious.org/AD/website.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.paladious.org/forums/][img]http://paladious.org/AD/forums.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.paladious.org/play.php][img]http://paladious.org/AD/play.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.paladious.org/Paladious_Client.zip][img]http://paladious.org/AD/download.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.paladious.org/forums/index.php?action=highscores][img]http://paladious.org/AD/highscores.png[/img][/url]
[size=14pt]Features[/size]
# Cycled skilling # Near flawless combat # Most special attacks # Tons of different new and old gear # All functioning skills # Extremely stabile server # Highscores & vote # Clean layout # Tons of bosses, dungeons and areas # All potions and food # Functioning curses and prayers # 508 rank clanchat # Supportive staff
[size=14pt]Bosses[/size]
# Corporeal beast # Godwars # Chaos elemental # Kalphite queen # Avatar of destruction # Decayng avatar # Aatar of creation # Bork # Dagannoths # King black dragon # Penace queen # Barrelchest # Tormented demons # Frost dragons # Strykewyrms
[size=14pt]Minigames[/size]
# Barrows # Fight caves # Pest control # Duel arena
[size=14pt]Skilling & combat features[/size]
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120308171131/runescape/images/0/00/Attack.png[/img]
# Functioning bonuses (Accuracy, stab, slash..) # Most commin weapons usable # All functioning special attacks # Correct requirements and accuracy # Higher attack makes you hit more often
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221055805/runescape/images/8/8b/Strength.png[/img]
# Functioning bonuses (Accuracy, stab, slash..) # Correct max hit formulas # Perfect zerker nicklace/maul combo # Perfect G Maul spec
[img]http://static4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120223123760/runescape/images/4/41/Defence.png[/img]
# Functioning bonuses (Accuracy, stab, slash..) # Damage soaking # Correct defence formulas # Correct item requirements # All common gear equippable
[img]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120301175043/runescape/images/c/c8/Ranged.png[/img]
# Functioning bonuses (Accuracy, stab, slash..) # All common range weapons # All bolts and specs # Zammy, sara and guthix bows # Chaotics & armadyl xbow # Correct max hit formula
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120224163119/runescape/images/3/32/Prayer.png[/img]
# Prayers and curses # Correct bonuses # Most regular prayers # Leeches, turmoil, soulsplit, wrath # All bones offer 1,5,10, ALL on altar # All common bones & frost bones
[img]http://static4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130330044951/runescape/images/f/f7/Magic.png[/img]
# All regular spells # 70% Lunar spells # All ancient spells # Multi barrages # Tabs and teleother # Most magic gear and weapons
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120728004013/runescape/images/5/5a/Runecrafting.png[/img]
# All runes craftable with correct locations # Proper abyssal rift # Runecrafting pouches and familiars # Correct rune multiplier and level requirements
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120728003653/runescape/images/4/4b/Hunter.png[/img]
# Different implings to hunt # Regular and magic net to speed up hunt # Open jar for different loots # Rare loots from implings
[img]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120613185502/runescape/images/1/14/Agility.png[/img]
# Full gnome stronghold course # Spam throttle # Cannot get stuck # Xp per completed laps + bonus # Ticket per lap and ticket exchange
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120118045926/runescape/images/b/bf/Herblore.png[/img]
# All common potions # make X,1,5,10,ALL cycled # Extreme potions mixing # Overload, spec attack, super prayer mixing # Auto clean herb
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120223124733/runescape/images/f/f4/Thieving.png[/img]
# 6 thieve chest for different loots # Throttle for antispam # 0.07% chance for rare items # Master farmer to pickpocket for seeds # Elf to pickpocket for gems # Pickpocket 0.04% chance for rare gem or seed pack
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221055812/runescape/images/f/ff/Crafting.png[/img]
# Tanning for all hides # All hide crafting # All gem crafting # String making and gem tip making # make X,1,5,10,ALL cycled # Make bolt tips and enchant
[img]http://static4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120225193919/runescape/images/6/6e/Slayer.png[/img]
# Alternative tasking # 10 tiers of tasks for different levels # 70+ different tasks # Extreme tasks for maxed players # Slayer points and task bonuses # Point exchange for different items # Fully functional slayer helm, focus sight and hexcrest
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120116165812/runescape/images/1/1b/Summoning.png[/img]
# 99% summoning and pouches # 100% Scrolling and specs # All BOB familiars # All pouches craftable # Correct max hits for familiars
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120728003714/runescape/images/4/41/Mining.png[/img]
# All common rock minable # Correct speeds for different pickaxes # Adze, dragon pick, familiar boosts # 3 different mining areas
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120119045449/runescape/images/8/84/Smithing.png[/img]
# All common ores/bars # Cycled smelting # Cycled 1,5,10,ALL smithing # Spirit shield and dragon armor making # DFS smithing
[img]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120116165214/runescape/images/1/19/Fishing.png[/img]
# All common fishes # Rocktail fishing # All correct speeds, anims, levels # 4 fishing areas
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120728010118/runescape/images/f/f4/Cooking.png[/img]
# All common fishes # Cooking gountlesses # Cycled cook 1,5,10,ALL # Correct level requirements and burn rates
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120116164956/runescape/images/2/2c/Firemaking.png[/img]
# All logs burnable # Fire to ashes # Bonfire # Correct functioning adze
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120224163230/runescape/images/d/df/Woodcutting.png[/img]
# All common trees # Correct cutting speed for axes # Cutting speed adjusts for level # Tree stumps # Birdnests # Correct functioning adze
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120223124331/runescape/images/1/18/Farming.png[/img]
# All common herbs # All common rees *** Farming not finished ***
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120223124113/runescape/images/1/15/Dungeoneering.png[/img]
*** Currently disabled ***
[size=14pt]Images[/size] [img]http://paladious.org/AD/bork.jpg[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/AD/dung.jpg[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/AD/hunt.jpg[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/AD/sum.jpg[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/AD/barrows.png[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/AD/bosses.png[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/AD/corp.png[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/AD/gwd.png[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/AD/jad.png[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/images/bandos.jpg[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/images/bank.bmp[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/images/chaos.jpg[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/images/dbow.bmp[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/images/farm.bmp[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/images/hunt.jpg[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/images/pc.jpg[/img] [img]http://paladious.org/images/summoning.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.paladious.org/Paladious_Client.zip][img]http://paladious.org/AD/dnlad.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.paladious.org/Paladious_Client.zip][img]http://paladious.org/AD/dnlad.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.paladious.org/Paladious_Client.zip][img]http://paladious.org/AD/dnlad.png[/img][/url]

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:9, topic:536307”][quote author=rs614 link=topic=655116.msg4387050#msg4387050 date=1385997019]
Construction is not in skill list and probably never will be. Skills that are in skilltab all functioning, other then dungeoneering. And object that crashes client forced me to temporary disable dungeoneering, but its still there and will be enabled as soon as graphical bugs that came with new client are fixed. Beta time ends by 10th december and by that time dungeoneering will be enabled once again and all skills fully trainable.
Its not to lure players… dungeoneering itself is paladious most largest and probably one of most detailed dungeoneering out there.
Unfortionally i have no idea how to fix this model and i have to wait until someone posts model on my help thread in rune-server.
[/quote]

Uhh… PI Servers have construction if that’s what your saying[/quote]Some PI servers have the most shittiest version of construction alive. It is no way the actual skill though.

Read full topic

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

Still up. Tons of fun. Come and play.

Read full topic

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

The playerbase died out however this month a mopar sponsor was purchased so we hope to come back from the ashes of the past

Read full topic

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:11, topic:536307”]To the mods: This is a bump because the server has come back at full force like the original and the advertisement was “unable” to be remade cause the server is still there.The last post was back in December so I think it’s well worth the bump.

So I am bumping this up. The owner recently purchased a mopar advert and the player base has already grown! I was on Saturday and saw 35+. On low hours we seem to be staying stable at around 10 players not including myself.

I would encourage anybody who likes a laid back community with an actually decent economy to check this out. The owner is a competent programmer and is always correcting bugs. Content ideas are always open for discussions also.

I would also like to state that some of the images in the advertisement are not 100% accurate. For example our farming has been improved vastly since that image has been taken and a few other items.[/quote]Paladious is still up… is the old playerbase even present? or a playerbase at all?

Read full topic

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

To the mods: This is a bump because the server has come back at full force like the original and the advertisement was “unable” to be remade cause the server is still there.The last post was back in December so I think it’s well worth the bump.

So I am bumping this up. The owner recently purchased a mopar advert and the player base has already grown! I was on Saturday and saw 35+. On low hours we seem to be staying stable at around 10 players not including myself.

I would encourage anybody who likes a laid back community with an actually decent economy to check this out. The owner is a competent programmer and is always correcting bugs. Content ideas are always open for discussions also.

I would also like to state that some of the images in the advertisement are not 100% accurate. For example our farming has been improved vastly since that image has been taken and a few other items.

Read full topic

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Have to say, the server really isn’t half bad. Though the mapdata is ugly as anything (though it might be me since I’ve been playing a lot of Euro Truck Simulator 2 with all of it’s HDness lately) and there’s a slight lack of players from what I’ve seen, it’s worth checking out. Just don’t hold your breath on voting for ‘premium points’, you’d have to vote for roughly 3 months to get a single item honestly.

Read full topic

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs

@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“rs614, post:5, topic:536307”]Construction is not in skill list and probably never will be. Skills that are in skilltab all functioning, other then dungeoneering. And object that crashes client forced me to temporary disable dungeoneering, but its still there and will be enabled as soon as graphical bugs that came with new client are fixed. Beta time ends by 10th december and by that time dungeoneering will be enabled once again and all skills fully trainable.
Its not to lure players… dungeoneering itself is paladious most largest and probably one of most detailed dungeoneering out there.
Unfortionally i have no idea how to fix this model and i have to wait until someone posts model on my help thread in rune-server.[/quote]

Uhh… PI Servers have construction if that’s what your saying

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I’ll try it out.

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Paladious was a great server a year ago and I even did some minor forum administration for him back in the day.

I look forward to seeing updates to this. If anybody wishes to see a HIGHLY economical based server this is for you. There will be skillers and pvmers alike. Skilling is fair experience but yet challenging as well. There is good profit to be made as well from skilling unlike most servers.

Vouch for Justah <3

Read full topic

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @rs614 rs614
item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

Construction is not in skill list and probably never will be. Skills that are in skilltab all functioning, other then dungeoneering. And object that crashes client forced me to temporary disable dungeoneering, but its still there and will be enabled as soon as graphical bugs that came with new client are fixed. Beta time ends by 10th december and by that time dungeoneering will be enabled once again and all skills fully trainable.
Its not to lure players… dungeoneering itself is paladious most largest and probably one of most detailed dungeoneering out there.
Unfortionally i have no idea how to fix this model and i have to wait until someone posts model on my help thread in rune-server.

Read full topic

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @Ykcud Ykcud
item.description:
@Ykcud wrote:

“all functioning skills” but dungeoneering is disabled and construction is not mentioned. Maybe I am misinterpreting it, but it seems like perhaps it was placed in there as a generic phrase to attract players. Best of luck with the server though.

Read full topic

item.title: ★★ Paladious ★★ ~ ★★ Battle for glory ★★
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Post in regards to the advertisement/server or don’t post at all.
Thanks, and good luck with your server.

Read full topic

@rs614 wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Paladious has been officialy released to public![/size][/center]
[center]

www.paladious.org

Welcome to Paladious adertisement thread. Paladious is RuneScape priate server since 2009.
Closed in 2013 spring and re-opened in December 2013.
Paladious is skilling and PVM focused server that has tons of bosses to destroy and all 24 skills functioning. Skills has been flawed to almost perfection.
No spam clicking or consnstant screen gazing. Almost every skill has been cycled. Make 1,5,10,all. Bosses are detailed and some of them almost impossible to solo.
Updates two times per week, makes Paladious one of most active programmed server out there. Paladious has carefully selected staff to assist players and help Paladious grow bigger then ever. Stability of server is insane. Paladious test run was 2 months without server restart on 512mb ram linux vps. Paladious has it all… Just come and see yourself. Hope to see you ingame soon!





[size=14pt]Features[/size]

Cycled skilling

Near flawless combat

Most special attacks

All functioning skills
